Title: Is my solution correct? subgroups and quotients of solvable groups are solvable
AcceptedAnswer:
As Eric Auld mentioned in the comment, the statement that $G_0/N=1/N$ is incorrect. To fix this, you may use the normal chain
$$\begin{equation}
1=G_0N/ N  \triangleleft G_1N/  N \triangleleft \dots \triangleleft G_sN/ N =G/N.
\end{equation}$$
